nodes.text: Aqualish Military Advisors were elite Aqualish military strategists from the planet Ando. Toward the end of the Galactic Civil War, some of them journeyed to the Anoat sector to trade knowledge and tactics with Her Majesty and the Noble Court. After the Imperial governor Ubrik Adelhard established the Iron Blockade, the Aqualish were trapped in the sector, and they became key assets in the struggle against the governor.
